00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *fic;
00028     unsigned char buf[1];
00029     struct List *list, *cell;
00030  
00031     adfEnvInitDefault();
00032 
00033     /* create and mount one device */
00034     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev", 80, 2, 11);
00035     if (!hd) {
00036         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00037         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00038     }
00039 
00040     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00041 
00042     if (adfCreateFlop( hd, "empty", FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE )!=RC_OK) {
00043         fprintf(stderr, "can't create floppy\n");
00044         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00045         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00046     }
00047 
00048     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00049     if (!vol) {
00050         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00051         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00052         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00053     }
00054 
00055     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "file_1a","w");
00056     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00057     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00058     adfCloseFile(fic);
00059 
00060     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00061 
00062     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00063 
00064     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00065     while(cell) {
00066         printEntry(cell->content);
00067         cell = cell->next;
00068     }
00069     adfFreeDirList(list);
00070 
00071     adfSetEntryAccess(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_5u", 0|ACCMASK_A|ACCMA0SK_E);
00072     adfSetEntryAccess(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "file_1a", 0|ACCMASK_P|ACCMASK_W);
00073 
00074     putchar('\n');
00075 
00076     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00077     while(cell) {
00078         printEntry(cell->content);
00079         cell = cell->next;
00080     }
00081     adfFreeDirList(list);
00082 
00083     adfSetEntryAccess(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_5u", 0x12 & !ACCMASK_A & !ACCMASK_E);
00084     adfSetEntryAccess(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "file_1a", 0x24 & !ACCMASK_P & !ACCMASK_W );
00085 
00086     putchar('\n');
00087 
00088     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00089     while(cell) {
00090         printEntry(cell->content);
00091         cell = cell->next;
00092     }
00093     adfFreeDirList(list);
00094 
00095     adfUnMount(vol);
00096     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00097 
00098     adfEnvCleanUp();
00099 
00100     return 0;
00101 }
